channel.title: Latest Software Image only includes a SIERRA PRI image
channel.description:
I've installed the WP76XX SPK without Octave software image fromhttps://mangoh.io/mangoh-yellow-resources-software to a mangOH Yellow but it appears to only include a PRI update for SIERRA?
After install FW image 02.37.03.00_SIERRA is active:
``` at!image? TYPE SLOT STATUS LRU FAILURES UNIQUE_ID BUILD_ID FW 1 GOOD 129 0 0 ?_? 02.32.03.00_? FW 2 EMPTY 0 0 0 FW 3 FOTA 130 0 0 001.060_000 02.37.03.00_SIERRA Max FW images: 3 Active FW image is at slot 3
TYPE SLOT STATUS LRU FAILURES UNIQUE_ID BUILD_ID PRI FF GOOD 0 0 0 002.087_000 02.32.03.00_ATT PRI FF GOOD 0 0 0 002.080_000 02.32.03.00_GENERIC PRI FF GOOD 0 0 0 001.060_000 02.37.03.00_SIERRA PRI FF GOOD 0 0 0 001.008_000 02.32.03.00_SPRINT PRI FF GOOD 0 0 0 001.012_000 02.32.03.00_TMO PRI FF GOOD 0 0 0 002.087_000 02.32.03.00_VERIZON Max PRI images: 50 ```
But at this point, if I use IMPREF to enable anything other than SIERRA, the active FW image reverts back to 02.32.03.00_?, e.g.:
``` at!impref="VERIZON" OK at!reset OK
(After reboot, reconnect)
at!image? TYPE SLOT STATUS LRU FAILURES UNIQUE_ID BUILD_ID FW 1 GOOD 131 0 1 ?_? 02.32.03.00_? FW 2 EMPTY 0 0 0 FW 3 FOTA 130 0 0 001.060_000 02.37.03.00_SIERRA Max FW images: 3 Active FW image is at slot 1
TYPE SLOT STATUS LRU FAILURES UNIQUE_ID BUILD_ID PRI FF GOOD 0 0 0 002.087_000 02.32.03.00_ATT PRI FF GOOD 0 0 0 002.080_000 02.32.03.00_GENERIC PRI FF GOOD 0 0 0 001.060_000 02.37.03.00_SIERRA PRI FF GOOD 0 0 0 001.008_000 02.32.03.00_SPRINT PRI FF GOOD 0 0 0 001.012_000 02.32.03.00_TMO PRI FF GOOD 0 0 0 002.087_000 02.32.03.00_VERIZON Max PRI images: 50
OK ```
Is there a different approach I should be using to get updated PRI images for other carriers for the latest FW image?
Thanks

item.title: Latest Software Image only includes a SIERRA PRI image
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
you can run it twice to update one by one

Read full topic

item.title: Latest Software Image only includes a SIERRA PRI image
item.dc:creator: allynsnook
item.description:
Thanks! I’d like to update more than one carriers’ PRI image (e.g. have the latest TMO and ATT) AND have the latest FW image. How to do that? Is it possible?

Read full topic

item.title: Latest Software Image only includes a SIERRA PRI image
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
that spk only contains SIERRA PRI:

owner@ubuntu:~$ swicwe -P /home/owner/Desktop/mangOH-yellow-wp76xx_0.7.0.spk 
 Type	 Size(Exclude Header)	 Product	 Compress	 Version
*SPKG    69620199                Y921            0               9999999_9908787_SWI9X07Y_02.37.03.00_00_SIERRA_001.060_000
*BOOT    420864                  Y921            0               SWI9X07Y_02.37.03.00 73df45 CARMD-EV-SIGN01 2020/04/08 17:11:15
 HASH    6480                    9X28            0               SWI9X07Y_02.37.03.00 73df45 CARMD-EV-SIGN01 2020/04/08 17:11:15
 SBL1    413584                  9X28            0               SWI9X07Y_02.37.03.00 73df45 CARMD-EV-SIGN01 2020/04/08 17:11:15
*MODM    28216140                Y921            0               SWI9X07Y_02.37.03.00 73df45 CARMD-EV-SIGN01 2020/04/08 17:11:15
 HASH    6560                    9X28            0               SWI9X07Y_02.37.03.00 73df45 CARMD-EV-SIGN01 2020/04/08 17:11:15
 TZON    522748                  9X28            0               SWI9X07Y_02.37.03.00 73df45 CARMD-EV-SIGN01 2020/04/08 17:11:15
 QRPM    160112                  9X28            0               SWI9X07Y_02.37.03.00 73df45 CARMD-EV-SIGN01 2020/04/08 17:11:15
 DSP2    27525120                9X28            0               SWI9X07Y_02.37.03.00 73df45 CARMD-EV-SIGN01 2020/04/08 17:11:15
*FILE    30891                   Y921            0               9999999_9908787_SWI9X07Y_02.37.03.00_00_SIERRA_001.060_000
*APPL    34920592                Y921            0               SWI9X07Y_02.37.07.00 2020/12/09 09:46:03
 SYST    25165824                9X28            0               SWI9X07Y_02.37.07.00 2020/12/09 09:46:03
 APPS    9753968                 9X28            0               3.18.140 20201209094952
*APPL    6029712                 Y921            0               19.11.3-1-g8c030edad vzhu-linux 2020/12/09 03:04:35
 USER    6029312                 9X28            0               19.11.3-1-g8c030edad vzhu-linux 2020/12/09 03:04:35

You can load the required VZW image to it before loading this image.

item.title: Latest Software Image only includes a SIERRA PRI image
item.dc:creator: allynsnook
item.description:
I’ve installed the WP76XX SPK without Octave software image fromhttps://mangoh.io/mangoh-yellow-resources-software to a mangOH Yellow but it appears to only include a PRI update for SIERRA?

After install FW image 02.37.03.00_SIERRA is active:

at!image?
TYPE SLOT STATUS LRU FAILURES UNIQUE_ID   BUILD_ID
FW   1    GOOD   129 0 0      ?_?         02.32.03.00_?
FW   2    EMPTY  0   0 0                  
FW   3    FOTA   130 0 0      001.060_000 02.37.03.00_SIERRA
Max FW images: 3
Active FW image is at slot 3

TYPE SLOT STATUS LRU FAILURES UNIQUE_ID   BUILD_ID
PRI  FF   GOOD   0   0 0      002.087_000 02.32.03.00_ATT
PRI  FF   GOOD   0   0 0      002.080_000 02.32.03.00_GENERIC
PRI  FF   GOOD   0   0 0      001.060_000 02.37.03.00_SIERRA
PRI  FF   GOOD   0   0 0      001.008_000 02.32.03.00_SPRINT
PRI  FF   GOOD   0   0 0      001.012_000 02.32.03.00_TMO
PRI  FF   GOOD   0   0 0      002.087_000 02.32.03.00_VERIZON
Max PRI images: 50

But at this point, if I use IMPREF to enable anything other than SIERRA, the active FW image reverts back to 02.32.03.00_?, e.g.:

at!impref="VERIZON"
OK
at!reset
OK

(After reboot, reconnect)

at!image?
TYPE SLOT STATUS LRU FAILURES UNIQUE_ID   BUILD_ID
FW   1    GOOD   131 0 1      ?_?         02.32.03.00_?
FW   2    EMPTY  0   0 0                  
FW   3    FOTA   130 0 0      001.060_000 02.37.03.00_SIERRA
Max FW images: 3
Active FW image is at slot 1

TYPE SLOT STATUS LRU FAILURES UNIQUE_ID   BUILD_ID
PRI  FF   GOOD   0   0 0      002.087_000 02.32.03.00_ATT
PRI  FF   GOOD   0   0 0      002.080_000 02.32.03.00_GENERIC
PRI  FF   GOOD   0   0 0      001.060_000 02.37.03.00_SIERRA
PRI  FF   GOOD   0   0 0      001.008_000 02.32.03.00_SPRINT
PRI  FF   GOOD   0   0 0      001.012_000 02.32.03.00_TMO
PRI  FF   GOOD   0   0 0      002.087_000 02.32.03.00_VERIZON
Max PRI images: 50

OK

Is there a different approach I should be using to get updated PRI images for other carriers for the latest FW image?

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Latest Software Image only includes a SIERRA PRI image
